column4: hi all - I'm having a lot of trouble trying to print to a network printer shared from a Mac on my network. I've added the device vie `system-config-printer`, but I'm unable to print
Do you have printer drivers for the printer in question? Are you able to print if you connect directly to the printer via USB (as a test)?
yea; I have the correct drivers & seems ok @ direct. but I'm consitering pushing it through some sort of tranlation layer - ie. ""generic printer
I don't know. What happens when you try to print via the default setup (through the network)?
